name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
People's Daily: "TikTok refugees" flock to Xiaohongshu, what do you think?
"This news makes people more deeply understand what the general trend is and what the people's hearts are. The American people want to live a normal life, Chinese companies want to develop normally, and the people of China and the United States want to communicate normally... This is the people's heart, this is the general trend. Some American netizens shouted: "It's time to open your eyes and look at China!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At noon on January 13, Maoming, Guangdong. A black pickup truck stopped on the roadside. An urban management officer got out of the car and walked straight to the door of the merchant, took a box of goods, and then drove away.
The video poster said: He has been taking it for two years.
According to reports, the urban management officer involved was a formal staff member, had been criticized and educated, and paid the money to the merchant the next day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 15, Baoji, Shaanxi. An old man was wandering with his four dogs and had only 4 yuan left in his pocket. He was hungry and wanted to buy half a bowl of rice noodles. A man passing by wanted to give some money to help the old man, but the old man refused: "That's the money you worked hard to earn." Seeing that the old man refused to take the money, the man treated the old man to a bowl of noodles and told the boss that he would pay for the old man's meal next time. The old man refused again: "If you do this, you will breed some very lazy people."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 13, Hefei, Anhui. The demolition workers tried to climb the ladder to enter the household in the early morning, but were attacked by the owner of the second floor with stones, so the demolition workers temporarily evacuated.
Then more people armed with sticks entered the yard of the household from the first floor. One of the men used a stick to beat the dog tied in the yard. Then the crowd pried open the door of the owner's house and broke into the house.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 13, Hefei, Anhui. The demolition workers tried to climb the ladder to enter the household in the early morning, but were attacked by the owner of the second floor with stones, so the demolition workers temporarily evacuated.
Another group of people entered the yard of the household from the first floor with sticks. One of the men used a stick to beat the dog tied in the yard, and then they pried open the door of the owner's house and broke into the house.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 16, Lu Jian, a teacher at Jiangsu University, published an article revealing the secret of Jiangsu University's paper citation rate: "If you cite agricultural and forestry science papers from other agricultural-related teams at Jiangsu University more than seven times, you will be rewarded with 15,000 yuan in funding" in order to improve the school's subject ranking.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 15, an American netizen posted on Xiaohongshu: "I am also interested in Marxism, but I have always been confused. Once we revolt, where should we go? How to build a stable government so that greedy people will not climb to the top and exploit the people" 
The post was subsequently deleted by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
‼ ️ Beware of VPN users ‼ ️ Yellow push QR codes may lead to Chinese government department websites
In X private messages, people are accustomed to the so-called "yellow push" and "naked chat" QR codes. However, recently, a netizen decoded a yellow push WeChat QR code he received and found that the QR code actually led to the Gansu Provincial Government Department website (Figure 1).
After that, we sorted out the yellow push QR codes in the private messages and found that there were two fake yellow push WeChat QR codes that led to the Jiaxing Federation of Trade Unions and Huzhou government department websites respectively. After using WeChat to scan, it will jump from the government website to a website with the address "zns.china-yd.com".
At present, we cannot determine whether this phenomenon is a hacker using a loophole in the government website to collect users' WeChat personal information.
Netizens are welcome to use the QR code decoder to check the WeChat QR code received in their private messages and submit their contributions

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
For security reasons, we have coded these QR codes.
Journalists and interested technicians are requested to send us a private message to obtain the QR codes for analysis.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 16, Hunan. The electronic screen at the door of a restaurant reads: Americans, Japanese, Jews, and beasts are prohibited from entering. The military and civilians are united to strengthen national defense.
In addition, there is a portrait of Mao Zedong hanging in the store. Some netizens said: "He has never even seen foreigners in his life and he hates them."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The National Bureau of Statistics released data:
China's GDP reached 134,908.4 billion yuan in 2024, a year-on-year increase of 5%. The main goals and tasks of economic and social development were successfully completed.
The employment situation was generally stable in 2024, and the urban survey unemployment rate declined.
In 2024, the national per capita disposable income of residents was 41,314 yuan, a nominal increase of 5.3% over the previous year, and an actual increase of 5.1% after deducting price factors;
The per capita disposable income of urban residents was 54,188 yuan, a nominal increase of 4.6%, and an actual increase of 4.4% after deducting price factors;
The per capita disposable income of rural residents was 23,119 yuan, a nominal increase of 6.6%, and an actual increase of 6.3% after deducting price factors. ​​​
At the end of 2024, the national population decreased by 1.39 million compared with the end of the previous year. The number of births in the whole year was 9.54 million, the number of deaths was 10.93 million, and the natural population growth rate was -0.99%

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"TikTok refugees" flocking to China's Xiaohongshu posted videos expressing their love for China and its leaders:
"The Communist Party of China is the best government in the world, the most transparent government in the world, I love the Communist Party of China"
"Here comes Lao Diao, hello China, I love Xi Jinping" (the video has been deleted)
"If I have to choose between the United States and China, I choose China"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Professor Zhang Zuofeng of epidemiology expressed his opinion on acupuncture anesthesia: Acupuncture anesthesia is a product of the Cultural Revolution. Acupuncture only reduces the pain of most patients, and it is difficult to completely anesthetize them for surgery. I remember that in 1975, a male patient had a gastric perforation and was operated on with acupuncture anesthesia, which caused the patient to be in great pain and scream continuously.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A black guy used Xiaohongshu for the first time and was "taught a lesson" by netizens as soon as he posted a selfie. Currently, his Xiaohongshu account has been banned by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At the Foreign Ministry press conference, an American reporter asked: Is China considering providing assistance to the victims of the Los Angeles wildfire?

Spokesperson Guo Jiakun: "Serious wildfires have occurred in the Los Angeles area of ​​the United States recently. We express our condolences to the victims and our sympathy to the injured and the families of the casualties." ​​​
Netizen: Why did he reply to the message again?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many overseas IP users said that the "hot spots", "live broadcast", "same city" and other functions on the top of the Douyin homepage have disappeared, leaving only "follow" and "recommendation"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
US President-elect Trump was sworn in on Monday, and China announced on Friday (January 17) that Chinese President Xi Jinping's special representative and Vice President Han Zheng will go to the United States to attend the ceremony.
The Financial Times reported on January 10: This will be an unprecedented move by Beijing to reduce friction between China and the United States. In previous US presidential inaugurations, China was represented by the Chinese ambassador to the United States.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 16, an American netizen posted a message asking for help in coming up with a Chinese name.
Chinese netizen replied: "Liu Mang"
American netizen: "What does this mean?"
Chinese netizen: "It means handsome guy" "It means you shine"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens added more Huangtui WeChat QR codes
After testing, they were directed to government websites in Langfang and other places

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 17, a man posted a message on Xiaohongshu asking for help, saying that he had been trapped in a Myanmar online fraud park for half a year. He also sent out his coordinates and family phone numbers, hoping to attract the government's attention. He also said: People like us who have no money, power or influence deserve to disappear like a speck of dust in the vast universe without causing any waves?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
1: On January 17, Xi'an. Migrant workers gathered at the headquarters office of Gaoke Real Estate Group to demand their wages.
2: On January 16, Xinjiang. Construction workers slept on the floor of the sales office to demand their wages.
3: On January 17, Nanxiong, Guangdong. Migrant workers demanded their wages on the roof of Zhongtai Huafu Community.
4: On January 15, Wuhan, Hubei, migrant workers jumped off the building to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 17, Wuhan Baijia Women and Children's Hospital suddenly announced that it would close, and the medical staff collectively demanded their wages.
According to reports, some people were owed three and a half months' wages, totaling 25,000 yuan. The hospital has stopped accepting patients and the hospital leaders are not answering the phone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 17, the Internet revealed that the dormitory conditions of Tsingshan Steel Company's employees in the Indonesian industrial park were poor. The video showed that the workers lived in crowded and simple containers. The video shooter said, "Four workers lived in one container, with upper and lower bunks."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 17, the topic "Taiwan Angelica" topped the Weibo hot search list.
The Chinese Ministry of Defense responded to Lai Qingde's recent remarks: "We warn Lai Qingde's authorities and "Taiwan independence" elements that "using force to seek independence" is nothing but a mantis trying to stop a chariot, and is completely digging its own grave. The People's Liberation Army will never be soft in fighting "independence" and promoting reunification. We have every reason to believe that Taiwan Angelica will return, and the world will be bright when it returns."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @aim33_12 Your QR code leads to the Hunan government website

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A migrant worker who never got his wages back until his death.
January 16, Zhejiang. A woman posted that her father died in an accident. When she sorted out his belongings, she found that his WeChat balance was only 0.17 yuan, and he was still asking his boss for the unpaid wages the day before yesterday.
Because he had no money, his father was afraid to go to the hospital when he was sick. The online shopping platform showed that he had placed orders for 99 yuan anti-snoring patches many times, but he finally canceled the order because he couldn't bear to buy it. The last purchase record was a customized red envelope that his father bought for himself, but because he didn't have enough money, he finally bought a 5.99 yuan red envelope.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 16 (Released) A woman who claimed to be a former Tencent employee shouted to Ma Huateng: In recent years, few colleagues feel happy. Everyone lives in anxiety and pain. If a company cannot bring real physical and mental happiness to its employees, how can it bring happiness to its users?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Yesterday, CCTV Movie Channel broadcast "Wolf Warrior 2" and netizens questioned whether broadcasting "Wolf Warrior" at this critical juncture was a deliberate attempt to discredit it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A church in Yiyang, Hunan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 17, a woman from Hebei posted a message saying that she went to the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China to withdraw 40,000 yuan in deposits, but was told by the bank that "if you have more than 30,000 yuan, you must scan the public security code to withdraw it. This is the rule." 
The woman said: Ordinary people are free to save money, why can't they withdraw money freely? 
Netizens in the comment area: "How did those tens of millions or hundreds of millions of deposits transfer from banks to foreign countries?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
1: On January 16, Shaanxi Municipal Road and Bridge Company owed wages, and workers went to the company office to demand wages.
2: On January 17 (released) Shaanxi Xianyang. Workers gathered at the Qindu District Government Hall to demand wages.
3: On January 17, Shaanxi Xi'an. Migrant workers gathered at Greenland Group to demand wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a patriotic documentary "Prosperity as Wish" was released, but the box office data was not "as expected". Maoyan data showed that the box office of the film was only 70 yuan on Christmas Eve and Christmas Eve last year.
Many netizens gave the film a one-star bad review on Douban: "Stupid movie" "Long live! Long live! Long live!" "Another weird domestic main theme work"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 17, the Russian Embassy in my country: We have noticed with regret that some stores are selling counterfeit products or products not produced in our country under the guise of Russian products.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 17, Hua Chunying appeared at the 2025 Press Conference in China. A foreign reporter asked: What do you think about Xiaohongshu welcoming a large number of "TikTok refugees"? Hua Chunying: "I am very happy to see this. Young people have the freedom to choose."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 17, Mao Xiangdong, a member of the Standing Committee of the Shanghai Municipal People's Congress, said: "Nowadays, in the era of AI, as long as the cross-border flow of sensitive data is regulated and controlled, the benefits of opening up the international Internet outweigh the disadvantages." "Shanghai will attract foreigners by restoring the international Internet. I believe it can replace some of Hong Kong's functions and gradually build a modern international metropolis in a Chinese style."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Due to two recent dog bites in Xi'an, the local authorities launched a vigorous dog-catching operation and required dog owners to apply for dog licenses, with a price of 500 yuan per dog in key restricted areas and 200 yuan per dog in general restricted areas. At the same time, large dogs are prohibited within the Third Ring Road, including dogs with an adult shoulder height greater than 50 cm. If found, each dog may be fined more than 200 yuan.
According to many local netizens, in addition to forcibly catching outdoor dogs, the property management and police also teamed up to catch dogs at home, and even dogs in pet stores were loaded and taken away. Citizens were dissatisfied with the local one-size-fits-all approach. Some citizens posted the incident on the Internet platform and then received a call from the police asking them to delete the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content: On January 17, a Spanish netizen posted a message on Xiaohongshu asking for help, saying that she was born in Fuling, Chongqing, and was adopted when she was a baby. She hoped that Chinese netizens could provide her with some information about her hometown. However, many netizens in the comment area questioned whether she was a spy who came to fish for information: "Do you smell something unusual?" "Don't post pictures of Fuling randomly, be careful of 500,000 people"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 16, a netizen posted: "Why did the medical insurance suddenly stipulate that surgical sutures cannot be used with absorbable sutures? The sutures have to be removed half a month after the plate is removed." A netizen in the comment area replied: Our medical insurance stipulates that all surgeries cannot use pain pumps, even at your own expense. I had a six-hour laparotomy with a 20-centimeter-long incision. I couldn't rest well for several days because of the pain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 16, a netizen complained: I have renal failure and need dialysis, but the clearance rate of domestically produced dialysis machines cannot reach that of imported ones.
Another netizen: "My mother died of heart failure during dialysis last month. I didn't think it was related to this matter (medical insurance centralized procurement). I just checked the effective date of the withdrawal of the original research drug, which is December 30, 24, and my mother died on that day."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Zheng Minhua, Director of General Surgery at Ruijin Hospital: "Anesthetics don't make you sleep, blood pressure doesn't drop, and laxatives don't make you have diarrhea"
Zheng Minhua said that his father had long-term high blood pressure and had been using original research drugs before, but recently the community hospital changed his medicine for him. "He called me and his blood pressure suddenly dropped to 180. He asked me to go to the hospital to help him get the previous medicine." He himself has also been taking the high blood pressure drug Norvasc for a long time, but after switching to domestic drugs, one pill could not lower his blood pressure and he needed two pills, "but the instructions only say one pill." Norvasc is generically known as amlodipine besylate tablets, a blood pressure-lowering drug developed by Pfizer.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
TikTok and other Chinese apps have been complained by privacy protection organizations in Europe
None of Your Business, an Austrian-based activist group that advocates online privacy, said on Thursday (January 16) that they have filed complaints against six Chinese companies, including TikTok, in multiple European countries, accusing them of "illegally" sending Europeans' personal data to China.
The six companies are: TikTok (Douyin overseas version), AliExpress (Global AliExpress), Shein (Xiyin), Temu (Pinduoduo overseas version), WeChat (WeChat overseas version) and Xiaomi (Xiaomi) These complaints were filed in Austria, Belgium, Greece, Italy and the Netherlands, requiring these companies to suspend data transmission to China and seeking fines of up to 4% of the company's global revenue.
China's Ministry of Foreign Affairs...
fullContent:
TikTok等中国应用软件在欧洲遭到隐私保护组织投诉
 总部位于奥地利，提倡网络隐私的活动组织 None of Your Business 星期四(1月16日)表示，他们已在多个欧洲国家对包括TikTok在内的六家中国公司提出投诉，指控它们“非法”将欧洲人的个人数据发送到中国。
 这六家公司分别是：TikTok(抖音海外版)、AliExpress(全球速卖通)、Shein(希音)、Temu(拼多多海外版)、WeChat(微信海外版)和Xiaomi(小米)  这些投诉分别在奥地利、比利时、希腊、意大利和荷兰提出，要求这些公司暂停向中国传输数据，并寻求最高可达公司全球收入4%的罚款。
 中国外交部周五回应媒体提问时表示，中国政府“从来没有、也永远不会”要求企业或个人以违反当地法律的方式为中国政府收集或提供位于外国的数据信息和情报。
